europeana:record.dc:title: On two species of Archipelothelphusa Bott, 1969 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Sundathelphusidae) from Luzon, Philippines
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Ng P.K.L.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Crustacea
Decapoda
Brachyura
Gecarcinucoidea
Sundathelphusidae
Archipelothelphusa celer spec. nov.
semiterrestrial freshwater crabs
Luzon
Philippines
europeana:record.dc:description: The taxonomic problems concerning freshwater crabs of the genus Archipelothelphusa Bott, 1969 (Gecarcinucoidea: Sundathelphusidae) are discussed. The identity of Para-Bary-thelphusa grapsoides subsp. longipes Balss, 1937, is clarified, and a new species, A. celer spec. nov. is described from Luzon, Philippines.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: On two species of Archipelothelphusa Bott, 1969 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Sundathelphusidae) from Luzon, Philippines (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 65) (Issue 2)
